page.title: 02THE RESERVOIR "The ressie"
page.content: The reservoir is a place where you can play.We get sticks and some string and go fishing.Sometimes we go and climb through a pipe underneath the ground. We climb up trees and jump down on each other.The pipe leads to a waterfall.We went to{County Hall}it's beside the "ressie."We make jumps for our bikes.One day we went in to have a swim.The water was very cold but it was avery hot day.Once we went fishing and caught some sticklebacks,water snails,leeches and newts.When we came out of the water sticking to us were little red and black things.From the"ressie" runs a burn this is as far as we have gone. We think it about 8 miles long.There is an old shed or hut about 2 miles on.We played there once but must admit it is very dangerous.It is spooky.
